definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: leader (?);—pl. abs. [[בִּפְרׂעַ]] [[פְּרָעוֹת]] Ju Jdg 5:2 for the leading of the leaders (LXX:A Be Bu al., but uncertain; LXX:B Symm, cf. We:Isr. u. Jüd. Gesch. (2), 97; Held.(2). 123 al., for the loosing of locks [II. [[פֶּרַע]]], in vow of war; on these and other views v. esp. GFM:ad loc.; conj. also by Lambert:REêJ xxiv. 140 Grimme:ZMG 1(1896), 572 Che:JQ July 1899, 561 [reading [[ברכו]]]); cstr. [[מֵראׁשׁ פַּרְעוֹת אוֹיֵב]] De 32:42 from the head of leaders of the foe LXX Di Steuern al.; Kn Ke Dr al. from the long-haired heads of the foe.
